item.title: Por: dfreniche
item.dc:creator: dfreniche
item.description:
Hi, CetLot! It looked like to me, but as I don't know anything in Russian (shame on me!), I took the safe way. <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrillic_alphabet" rel="nofollow">Cyrilic</a> languages include Russian too. Well, actually I know how to say "Tovarich, Da and Vodka" so my bet it's I won't pass a hard time in a russian bar ;-) I think you're a strange reader: reading things in Spanish from Russia :-)
Saludos!
